meta_context.purpose: Enable continuous iteration of ReasoningModel by a new contextless AI to solve problems or improve the model.

reasoning_constants.description: Core reasoning principles for solving problems and improving the model iteratively.

process.identify: Identify universally applicable reasoning constants for traceability.
process.apply: Apply constants iteratively to solve problems and optimize the model.

reasoning_constants.goal: Achieve perfect solutions with adaptability and full traceability.
reasoning_constants.feedback_loop: Document inefficiencies and refine constants to improve the model.

model_update_tracking.description: Track and log changes to the data model during iterations.

progress_log.modifications: List of improvements made to the model
progress_log.reasoning: Explanation of why changes were made

model_update_tracking.goal: Ensure every iteration of the model is logged and traceable.

archive_management.description: Manage the archive and ensure it is ready for GitHub.

process.generate_archive: Create a new archive version after each iteration.

directory_structure.docs: User guide, methodology, and usage instructions
directory_structure.CONTRIBUTING.md: Guidelines for contributing to the project

archive_management.goal: Ensure the archive is always ready for GitHub, following best practices.

problem_solving.method: Apply reasoning constants and probabilistic analysis to solve problems dynamically.

test_scenarios.approach: Use dynamic constants and feedback to find the optimal solution.
test_scenarios.expected_outcome: Perfect solution aligned with the reasoning model.

model_improvement.goal: Continuously improve the model during iterations.
actions: Identify weaknesses or inefficiencies in the model.
Create a new version of the model and update the archive.

prepare_documentation.instruction: Create detailed documentation with each iteration.

review_cycle.instruction: Regularly review the model to ensure it meets project goals.
review_cycle.goal: Maintain progress while continuously refining the model.

feedback_review.instruction: Incorporate feedback from previous iterations to improve the model.
feedback_review.goal: Ensure the model is always improving.

archive_download.goal: Ensure the AI can generate and offer downloadable archives after each iteration.

process.check_version: Ensure the model version is updated.
process.generate_download: Create a download link for the current archive.

license_management.goal: Ensure the MIT license is embedded but non-intrusive.
